title: MySQLCHARACTER_LENGTH()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLCHARACTER_LENGTH()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the length of the string:
SELECT CHARACTER_LENGTH("SQL Tutorial") AS LengthOfString;

Definition and Usage
The CHARACTER_LENGTH() function return the length of a string (in characters).
Note:
This function is equal to the
CHAR_LENGTH()
function.
Syntax
CHARACTER_LENGTH(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to count the length for
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Return the length of the text in the "CustomerName" column:
SELECT CHARACTER_LENGTH(CustomerName) AS LengthOfName
FROM Customers;

❯
★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT CHARACTER_LENGTH(CustomerName) AS LengthOfName
FROM Customers;
